properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_ID != ?
INSERT INTO FRIEND(USER1 , USER2) VALUES(?,(SELECT USER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? ))
SELECT USER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO IN (SELECT USER2 AS FRIENDS FROM FRIEND WHERE USER1 = ? AND IS_AGREE='Y' UNION SELECT USER1 AS FRIENDS FROM FRIEND WHERE USER2 = ? AND IS_AGREE='Y')
